choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
explain use of Large Language Models (LLM) in AI research

### Response:

Large language models are used extensively in natural language processing(NLP) and artificial intelligence(AI) research to improve the accuracy of text classification. These LLMs help identify patterns, trends, and correlations between different features of a document or message content that can be analyzed by NLP algorithms. The application of these models has led to significant advancements in sentiment analysis, topic modeling, entity recognition, information retrieval systems, chatbots & virtual assistants.
